H0.text: For which minor sport do the USA and Europe compete annually for the Weber Cup. Bowling

H1.text: For which minor sport do the USA and Europe compete annually for the Weber Cup. Curling

H2.text: For which minor sport do the USA and Europe compete annually for the Weber Cup. Darts

H3.text: For which minor sport do the USA and Europe compete annually for the Weber Cup. Tenpins

A4.text: The Weber Cup is an annual men's ten-pin bowling competition between Team Europe and Team USA.
